Title: Data Engineer
Description: Migrated the backend from a KNIME server to a Python application hosted on GCP, saving $12k annually.
Built an optimized ETL pipeline with PySpark, analyzing Google Analytics data and presenting insights to clients on how to boost website conversions.

Title: Co-Founder & CTO
Description: Developed a TensorFlow model to detect real-time availability of over 200 parking spaces with 92% accuracy.
Deployed an application on GCP to analyze parking spot pricing data for event attendees by extracting real-time quotes from 2k+ garages across multiple platforms.
Constructed a React app allowing team members to add parking spaces to the internal BigQuery database.

Title: Research Assistant
Description: Designed a Flask application for annotating bounding boxes on images and stored changes in a SQL database.
Trained a PyTorch model to detect furniture in hotel room images for TraffickCam (traffickcam.com).

Title: Founder
Description: Short-term rental company focused on providing comfortable stays for travelers in the St. Louis area.

Title: Performance Analyst Investment Intern
Description: Automated an Excel fund report for portfolio managers with a Power BI dashboard, saving 40 hours monthly.
Composed SQL queries to answer questions on fund performance for the portfolio management team.

Title: Technology Intern
Description: Implemented a predictive model with SQL to forecast company-wide and branch level production with 89% accuracy based on current pipeline and historical data.
